meta.name: Chibi Tiny Tales
meta.description: The adventures of various Disney characters are presented in Chibi style.

videos.title: Phineas and Ferb: Doof's on the Naughty List
videos.overview: When Santa gives Dr. Doof coal for Christmas, Doof invents a Coal-inator ray to try to get revenge on old Saint Nick! But luckily Agent P is there to thwart him!
